item.title: How do I set nudge distance in Illustrator?
item.description: You can change your nudge increments distance in the Preferences Panel(Keyboard increments). Setting nudge distance/keyboard increment Uncheck snap to pixel in the view tab Change the keyboard increment in the Edit tab ->preference from 1 pixel(by fault) to a tiny one which you want. Tip also: the super nudge is a 10-times shift by holding the shift when using the arrow key.
